name: MAKE DIGGLET A FAMILY MAN
description:
Help Digglet find his way home! There are iron nuggets buried so watch out.

Iron Nuggets get invisible after 5 seconds so use your memory to find a safe path to your family.

Hint: Use surface nuggets and bottom layers as landmarks to plot your path :) 

W - UP

A - LEFT

S - DOWN

D - RIGHT
